message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_REFERENCE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: Reference Number %1n already exists.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_NAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Provider Name' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_NAME_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XFV_ENDDATE_MUST_NOT_BE_EARLIER_THAN_ENROLLMENT_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrollment Date, %2d.
The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrolment Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_COMMENT_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_USER_MUST_BE_MEMBER_OF_RESOURCE_MANAGER_ORG_OBJECT
message.locale: User, %1s, must be a member of the %2s to perform this task.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XFV_DESIGNATED_CAPACITY_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_PHY_CAPACITY
message.locale: Designated Capacity, %1n, must be less than or equal to the Physical Capacity %2n.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_SOME_SEARCH_CRITERIA_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: You must specify some search criteria.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_REFERENCE_NO_IS_SPECIFIED_OTHER_SEARCH_CRITERIA_IS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: If Reference Number is specified other criteria must not be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_REASON_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Reason' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_ENROLLMENT_DATE_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: Enrollment date cannot be updated.
Enrolment date cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_RECORD_STATUS_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: Provider record status cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_ONLY_APPROVED_STATUS_CAN_BE_SUSPENDED
message.locale: This provider is not 'Approved', it cannot be suspended.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_ONLY_OPEN_STATUS_CAN_BE_REJECTED
message.locale: This provider is not 'Open', it cannot be rejected.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_ONLY_CLOSED_STATUS_CAN_BE_REOPENED
message.locale: This provider is not 'Closed', it cannot be re-opened.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_PROVIDER_MEMBER_ROLE_EXISTS
message.locale: The specified provider member with the role '%1c' already exists.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_PROVIDER_DESIGNATED_CAPACITY_GT_ZERO
message.locale: Designated Capacity must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_PROVIDER_PHYSICAL_CAPACITY_GT_ZERO
message.locale: Physical Capacity must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_CLOSED_PROVIDER_CANNOT_BE_APPROVED
message.locale: This provider is 'Closed', it cannot be approved.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_PERSON_REGISTRATION_OPTION_SELECTION_EMPTY
message.locale: You must select one option.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_USER_CANNOT_CLOSE_CLOSED_PROVIDER
message.locale: This provider has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_USER_CANNOT_APPROVE_APPROVED_PROVIDER
message.locale: This provider has already been approved.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_PROVIDER_PHYSICAL_CAPACITY_INVALID
message.locale: Physical Capacity entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_PROVIDER_DESIGNATED_CAPACITY_INVALID
message.locale: Designated Capacity entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_UNIMPLEMENTED_CONCERN_ROLE_TYPE
message.locale: The concern role type %1c has not been implemented as a Provider Organization.
The concern role type %1c has not been implemented as a Provider Organisation.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_PROVIDER_DESIGNATED_CAPACITY_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: Designated Capacity cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_PHYSICAL_CAPACITY_GREATER_THAN_LIMIT
message.locale: Physical capacity must be less than or equal to %1n.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_PROVIDER_CLOSED_CANNOT_UPDATE_DETAILS
message.locale: This provider is closed. Provider Details cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_PROVIDER_LIVE_CONTRACTS_PRESENT_PROVIDER_CANNOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: There are 'Live' flat rate contracts, this provider cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_PROVIDER_PREFFERED_LANGUAGE_DOES_NOT_MATCH_USER_SKILLS_LANGUAGE
message.locale: The Preferred Language, %1c, of the provider does not match any language in the user skills.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_PERSON_REGISTRATION_DATE_EQUALS_PROVIDER_ENROLLMENT_DATE
message.locale: The Registration Date, %1d must be equal to the Enrollment Date, %2d of the Provider, %3s.
The Registration Date, %1d must be equal to the Enrolment Date, %2d of the Provider, %3s.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_PROVIDER_RESERVATION_GRACE_PERIOD_INVALID
message.locale: Reservation Grace Period entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_PROVIDER_RESERVATION_GRACE_PERIOD_GT_ZERO
message.locale: Reservation Grace Period must be greater than zero.

message.name: INF_PROVIDER_XRV_HAS_OPEN_PROVIDER_INCIDENTS
message.locale: There are 'Open' incidents recorded against this provider.

message.locale: No provider member could be found.

message.locale: There are open investigations.

message.locale: There are open incidents.

message.locale: Open investigations relating to this provider

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_NAME_EXCEEDS_MAXLIMIT
message.locale: The value entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_PROVIDER_ACTIVE_PLACEMENTS_PRESENT_CANNOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: The provider cannot be closed as active placements exist with this provider.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_XRV_PROVIDER_ACTIVE_SERVICEDELIVERIES_PRESENT_CANNOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: The provider cannot be closed as active service deliveries exist with this provider.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_PROVIDER_ENDDATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_TODAY
message.locale: The provider end date must be on or before today.
